data.title: Silver could hit 10-year high and outperform gold, says Silver Institute
data.description: This year could bode well for silver demand, with prices potentially hitting a decade-high, said the Silver Institute.
data.content:
Bars of 100-ounce silver are stacked inside The Safe House, a vault operated by Silver Bullion Pte, in Singapore. Nicky Loh | Bloomberg | Getty Images
This could be a banner year for silver, with prices potentially hitting a decade-high. Global silve... [2602 chars]
